Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:45:12
Folder: C8ABAB4 - support groups during lebanon crisis
Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C8ABAB4_00
From: Chalhoub Wellbeing <Chalhoub.Wellbeing@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-06 18:17
Subject: Support Groups during Lebanon Crisis
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear colleagues, 

 

We understand that the ongoing crisis in Lebanon is difficult for everyone, bringing up a lot of unsettling emotions. Let’s come together to reflect on these experiences and navigate these challenging times as a community. Having a space to open up and share can be helpful.

 

Following the online sessions, we are organizing in-person small support groups facilitated by grief and trauma expert, Tanya Dharamshi. These sessions provide a safe space to process your experience, connect with others affected, and find mutual and professional support.

 

Who should attend? Anyone who is hurting or finding it difficult to cope with their emotions.

 

 

Please book your slot here:

chunks.text:
Since these are small group sessions, they might get fully booked quickly. If you don’t find an available slot, kindly register your interest here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FSrzyBvfq02&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C09a7f2a5743f44bbf59708dcfe6dad4a%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638664994382021669%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=f5hfDQ8qPqDrxpg93xCjTg%2BvHs8fYgoH41f2ydF%2BNOA%3D&reserved=0>  for upcoming sessions. 

 

For questions, please reach out to vida.aghili@chalhoub.com <mailto:vida.aghili@chalhoub.com> .

 

Best regards,

From: Chalhoub Wellbeing <Chalhoub.Wellbeing@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-11 13:38
Subject: Reminder: Support Groups during Lebanon Crisis
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear colleagues, 

 

We understand that the ongoing crisis in Lebanon is difficult for everyone, bringing up a lot of unsettling emotions. Let’s come together to reflect on these experiences and navigate these challenging times as a community. Having a space to open up and share can be helpful.

 

Following the online sessions, we are organizing in-person small support groups facilitated by grief and trauma expert, Tanya Dharamshi. These sessions provide a safe space to process your experience, connect with others affected, and find mutual and professional support.

Following the online sessions, we are organizing in-person small support groups facilitated by grief and trauma expert, Tanya Dharamshi. These sessions provide a safe space to process your experience, connect with others affected, and find mutual and professional support.

 

 

Please book your slot here: 

*	Thursday, Nov 14 | HO1, 10:30am - Book your slot <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FTcd6UQdXNh&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C3495537c49cd44b4e68c08dd02348a52%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638669146911085098%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AYGE0bsc8111F1UkqZ0zzrqwZT4qM5X2eLicrEBSndo%3D&reserved=0> 

 


Since these are small group sessions, they might get fully booked quickly. If you don’t find an available slot, kindly register your interest here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2Fr%2FSrzyBvfq02&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C3495537c49cd44b4e68c08dd02348a52%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638669146911116180%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QB7PXtVk6PRFvyarju6dlZA6AlupKeWqq3uKIDWrrlo%3D&reserved=0>  for upcoming sessions. 

 

For questions, please reach out to vida.aghili@chalhoub.com <mailto:vida.aghili@chalhoub.com> .

 

Best regards,
